ygData.subject: About me
ygData.msgSnippet: Name: David Lari City/State/Country: Charlotte NC, USA Gender: Male Home Page: http://www.geocities.com/laridj Relationship: Just celebrated my third
ygData.messageBody:
Name: David Lari
City/State/Country: Charlotte NC, USA
Gender: Male
Home Page: http://www.geocities.com/laridj
Relationship: Just celebrated my third anniversary Saturday with Tom.
Main Character (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level):
Shiari : 3rd Cleric High Elf on Rodcet
Any other characters (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level):
Dedric: 4th level gnome necro on Rodcet
Layf: 12th level human cleric on Veeshan
Kerik: 1st level ??? druid on Rodcet
Favorite EQ Monster/s: Willowisps
Most Hated EQ Monster/s: Bouncer (killed me 5 times in 9 minutes cause I was
bound where he was standing. He's why I quit for 9 months.)
Favorite TV Show/s:
Simpsons Will and Grace (or should we say Jack and Karen)
Favorite Author/s:
Orson Scott Card
Any non-EQ hobbies:
Sitting in our hot tub, being a gay activist, writing, going to the
beach to look at guys, going to the mall to look at guys, going anywhere to
look at guys. ;)
A few words that describe you:
Easy going, until someone pushes me too far.

FYI: If you close your EQ account and come back 9 months later, your
characters will still be there (even though they say they will delete them
in 60 days). Unfortunately, I deleted all my Brell Serillis characters
before I quit. :(
